ngiemboon: Ndòon ee twó pʉ̀a pie é gee ngwòŋ Egíbtò,
en: Woe to those who go down to Egypt for help
But he also is wise and brings disaster.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Egíbtò gwɔ́ pɔ́ pʉ̀a mesoŋ,
Anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ka shwóŋo wɔ́ɔn, ayɔɔn:
en: For this is what the Lord said to me:

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ, pi kéen ḿbú fó nzèm Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, ésẅɛʼte nnɛ́; pi piŋ nzèm ńtsɛ́ɛ yé.
en: Return to the one the Israelites have greatly rebelled against.

ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́, pi nyé messé mie pi la lɔgɔ tʉ̌ nkáb kà tʉ̌ ngɔ̂ɔ wɔ́ɔ, ńnyɛte, ńnyɛte púʼu né mbwó mí, mie pi lɔgɔ ńtɔ́ɔn menò.
en: For on that day, every one of you will reject the worthless idols of silver and gold that your own hands have sinfully made.

ngiemboon: Nně ncù gie e te ye pʉ̀a mesoŋ wɔ́,
Ecÿɔʼ ge gÿo gwoon wɔ́b, pɔ́ vɛ́,
en: His rock   will pass away because of fear,  # 31:9 Dt 32:31,37
